divs: Sighting DetailsI was out side enjoying the evening.. 821 Dolph Cir Chesapeake, VA (not to far from Fentress air force base) We hear jets all the time and do not think a think about it.tonight 3-29 it was very windy outside... and i was outside enjoying the evening and checking on my new plants. I thought i had seen a flash of some sort in the sky (though i was not looking at the sky) and then follow with a boom sound unlike the jets we have in the area. with in a few seconds later i heard the second boom not as loud. I did look up to the sky seeing nothing at this time, though it did not sound anything like the jets flying as usual. this did not sound like thunder...after that there was nothing...I later heard on the news others had heard or witness what i had.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Chesapeake
There was one other sighting in Chesapeake on or around March 29th 2009
Summary: A flash as if it was lighting with a very loud boom...it sounded light thunder...I heard it twice within a minute.
